scripts.start: npm run build:happ && concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "npm start -w @eyss/elemental-go"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w @eyss/elemental-go && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/elemental-go.happ --run=8888 -a test-app network mdns
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack workdir/
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ./dna/workdir/
